news.title: Swiftifor's First Mission to the Moon
news.description: Swiftifor is set to launch its first mission to the moon, aiming to explore new frontiers.

news.title: New Space Telescope Unveils Hidden Stars
news.description: Swiftifor's latest telescope reveals new details about distant stars and galaxies.

news.title: Mars Rover Sends Back Stunning Images
news.description: Images from Swiftifor's Mars rover capture the stunning landscapes of the Red Planet.

imageOfTheDay.title: Free Palestaine
imageOfTheDay.description: We deeply feel the pain and stuggle of the Palestinian peoples. we stand firmly with them in their pursuit of peace, justice, and dignity.
